title: Trump Gets Extremely Graphic In Describing Death Of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi
text: GiantCatfish: Here is a thought that the uneducated Trump supporters will not understand. Trump won the Electoral College. That is a fact. Trump received 47% of the popular vote. That is a fact. 53% of the people that voted in the last election voted against Trump. That is a fact. 3-4% 0f Trumps 47% were Democrats and "middle of the road" voters that were never going to vote for Hillary. That is a fact. Trumps base support is around 43%. That is a fact. To a Trump supporter, 43% is a majority. Hence, the term uneducated when it comes to simple mat. 50% +1 is a majority, not 43%. Trump is NOT popular. The game crowd reaction is how a majority of people feel in this country. That is a fact.
description: The President revealed way too much when announcing the details of the Special Forces raid that took out the ISIS leader. #Monologue #LSSC #Colbert
